summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, and authorizing the extension until April 15, 1972 of a contract with Wayne Madsen for the sale and removal of alder and other hardwood from City-owned land in townships 22 and 23 North, Range 5 East, W.M., and 22 North, Range 6 East, W.M., in the Lake Youngs Watershed forest.
